entry.title: Spice Cake & Vanilla Spice Latte Bundle
entry.summary:
Vendor: Antique Candle Co.
Type: Bundle of 2
Price: 65.00

Enjoy two one-of-a-kind collaboration candles in our Spice Cake & Vanilla Spice Latte Bundle. These fragrances each feature a unique blend of bakey, sweet, and cozy notes that create a perfectly homey atmosphere with must-have smells for the holiday season.

Get each candle for only $32.50 each when you purchase a bundle of two (Save $11!!)

Spice Cake: vanilla, cinnamon, + nutmeg (moderate strength)
Vanilla Spice Latte: vanilla, cinnamon, + espresso (strong strength)

BURN TIME: Up to 64 hours of burn time per candle (128 total hours).

INGREDIENTS: Our candles are made in Lafayette, Indiana with a clean, long-lasting, and even burn thanks to high-quality materials.

  • 100% natural soy wax from domestically grown soy beans.
  • Premium fragrance oils (hand-picked by thousands of candle testers across the U.S.!)
  • 100% lead-free cotton wicks.
  • Paraffin free, dye free, and cruelty free. This fragrance is also phthalate and paraben free.

DIMENSIONS: 5‚Äù x 3‚Äù x 3‚Äù

WEIGHT: 12.7 oz (359.2 g) per candle

Enjoy these and other fragrances in our curated candle bundles + save up to $100+.

entry.title: Vanilla Spice Latte by To Mimi's House We Go Brass Candle
entry.summary:
Vendor: Antique Candle Co.
Type: Brass Candle
Price: 95.00

Vanilla Spice Latte is a¬†delightfully spiced scent of cinnamon, nutmeg, and ginger with a cozy, warm blend of fresh espresso, maple brown sugar, and vanilla cream. This fragrance is a one-of-a-kind creation in collaboration with our friend Tina @to_mimi‚Äôshousewego!

"Vanilla Spice Latte captures that feeling of snuggling up with a warm drink and a good book. The spicy notes blend perfectly with sweet vanilla cream and espresso undertones to create a homey atmosphere I know you'll love as much as I do!"

BURN TIME + STRENGTH: Up to 54 hours of burn time in our unique brass candle. This spiced fragrance features a strong strength that combines all the best, cozy feels of Sweater Weather in a jar‚Äîperfect for those who love just a splash of coffee with their sweet and spiced cream.

INGREDIENTS: These 5-wick candles are poured in raw brass bowls for the perfect statement piece. Our candles are made in Lafayette, Indiana with a clean, long-lasting, and even burn thanks to high-quality materials.

  • 100% natural soy wax from domestically grown soy beans.
  • Premium fragrance oils (hand-picked by thousands of candle testers across the U.S.!)
  • 100% lead-free cotton wicks.
  • Paraffin free, dye free, and cruelty free. This fragrance is also phthalate and paraben free.

WEIGHT: 50 fl oz (1417.5 ml)
DIMENSIONS: 2.76" x 7"

Enjoy Vanilla Spice Latte in additional products.

entry.title: Vanilla Spice Latte by To Mimi's House We Go Soy Wax Melts
entry.summary:
Vendor: Antique Candle Co.
Type: Soy Wax Melt
Price: 18.00

Enjoy your favorite fragrances without the flame with Wax Melts that offer more, longer-lasting scents than ever before in a mess-free and easy to store bag.¬†

Vanilla Spice Latte is a delightfully spiced scent of cinnamon, nutmeg, and ginger with a cozy, warm blend of fresh espresso, maple brown sugar, and vanilla cream. This fragrance is a one-of-a-kind creation in collaboration with our friend Tina @to_mimi‚Äôshousewego!

"Vanilla Spice Latte captures that feeling of snuggling up with a warm drink and a good book. The spicy notes blend perfectly with sweet vanilla cream and espresso undertones to create a homey atmosphere I know you'll love as much as I do!"

With just 6-12 wax cubes in your warmer, this spiced fragrance features a strong strength that combines all the best, cozy feels of Sweater Weather in a jar‚Äîperfect for those who love just a splash of coffee with their sweet and spiced cream.

The 4 oz Soy Wax Melts bag includes approximately 55 cubes for up to 65 hours to total fragrance burn time.

All our melts are made in Lafayette, Indiana with natural soy wax from domestically grown soy beans for a clean, long-lasting burn every time. We use premium fragrance oils hand-picked by thousands of candle testers across the U.S.! All melts are paraffin free, dye free, and cruelty free.


WEIGHTS: 4.0 oz (113.4 g)
DIMENSIONS: 6.25" x 5.75"
